text: Jan Martin Gerardus Notermans (29 July 1932 â€“ 8 June 2017) was a Dutch football player and manager. He played for Fortuna '54 and Sittardia. He was capped 25 times for the Netherlands. He coached Arminia Bielefeld, Go Ahead Eagles, FC Groningen, AZ, Helmond Sport and Willem II. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Dutch football managers Category:Arminia Bielefeld managers Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:AZ Alkmaar managers Category:Willem II (football club) managers Category:FC Groningen managers
title: Jan Notermans
